content: Introducing Virtual Sports Chain: a new kind of Sports Investments platform that uses blockchain technology and its own cryptocurrency, VSChain. VSC is offering a wide variety of sports games and its own limited NFT Collection. With Virtual Sports Chain, users can invest in their favorite sports players and earn rewards based on their performances. VSChain is providing a marketplace for users to buy and sell digital shares of the sportsmen.The Limited NFT Collection is a series of digital collectibles that are linked to real-world sportsmen. These collectibles will be available for purchase with VSC tokens and will be used to participate and get some bonus in virtual sports games on the platform. Virtual Sports Chain is bringing a new level of excitement and investment opportunities to the world of sports fan.
